languages.text: "Их возглавляет комиссар Имперской гвардии, некий Иако Сотний. Весьма рьяный и громогласный человек. Утверждает, что он являлся ключевым звеном вашего плана побега из Комморры, и что он готов верно нести службу во имя Империума".

"They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Их возглавляет комиссар Имперской гвардии, некий Иако Сотний. Весьма рьяный и громогласный человек. Утверждает, что он являлся ключевым звеном вашего плана побега из Комморры, и что он готов верно нести службу во имя Империума".

traits.locale_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard commissar known as Iako Sotniy, a fierce man speaking in a thunderous tone. He insists on being the key part of your escape from Commorragh and his readiness to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

"They are led by an Imperial Guard commissar known as Iako Sotniy, a fierce man speaking in a thunderous tone. He insists on being the key part of your escape from Commorragh and his readiness to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

"They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar known as Iako Sotniy, a fierce man speaking in a thunderous tone. He insists on being the key part of your escape from Commorragh and his readiness to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

"They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar known as Iako Sotniy, a fierce man speaking in a thunderous tone. He insists on being the key part of your escape from Commorragh and his readiness to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

"They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

languages.text: “这些人的领袖是帝国卫队的伊科·索蒂尼政委。他是个相当有活力的人，说话中气十足。他坚称是协助您逃离科摩罗的关键人物，自称愿意以帝国的名义，忠实地为您服务。”
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “这些人的领袖是帝国卫队的伊科·索蒂尼政委。他是个相当有活力的人，说话中气十足。他坚称是协助您逃离科摩罗的关键人物，自称愿意以帝国的名义，忠实地为您服务。”

languages.text: « Ils sont dirigés par un commissaire de la Garde Impériale du nom de Iako Sotniy, un homme fougueux à la voix tonitruante qui se targue d'avoir joué un rôle clé dans votre évasion de Commorragh et affirme vouloir servir au nom de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont dirigés par un commissaire de la Garde Impériale du nom de Iako Sotniy, un homme fougueux à la voix tonitruante qui se targue d'avoir joué un rôle clé dans votre évasion de Commorragh et affirme vouloir servir au nom de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Sie werden von einem Kommissar der Imperialen Armee angeführt, Iako Sotniy, einem recht willensstarken Mann mit einer dröhnenden Stimme. Er behauptet, eine entscheidende Rolle bei Eurer Flucht aus Commorragh gespielt zu haben, und sagt, er sei bereit, treu im Namen des Imperiums zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Sie werden von einem Kommissar der Imperialen Armee angeführt, Iako Sotniy, einem recht willensstarken Mann mit einer dröhnenden Stimme. Er behauptet, eine entscheidende Rolle bei Eurer Flucht aus Commorragh gespielt zu haben, und sagt, er sei bereit, treu im Namen des Imperiums zu dienen."

languages.text: «Los lidera un comisario de la Guardia Imperial llamado Iako Sotniy, un hombre enérgico con una voz atronadora. Afirma que desempeñó un papel clave en su huida de Commorragh y está listo para servirl{mf|e|a} fielmente en nombre del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Los lidera un comisario de la Guardia Imperial llamado Iako Sotniy, un hombre enérgico con una voz atronadora. Afirma que desempeñó un papel clave en su huida de Commorragh y está listo para servirl{mf|e|a} fielmente en nombre del Imperium».

languages.text: 「彼らはイアコ・ソトニーという名の帝国防衛軍コミッサーによって、率いられています。彼はコモラフからの脱出に、重要な役割を果たしたらしく、帝国の名の下に忠実に仕える覚悟があると言っております」
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはイアコ・ソトニーという名の帝国防衛軍コミッサーによって、率いられています。彼はコモラフからの脱出に、重要な役割を果たしたらしく、帝国の名の下に忠実に仕える覚悟があると言っております」

languages.text: "Başlarında İako Sotniy adında, gür sesli bir İmparatorluk Muhafızı mensubu var. Kendisi komisermiş, şevkli biri. Commorragh'tan kaçışınızda kilit bir rol oynadığını, İmparatorluk adına sadakatle hizmet vereceğini iddia ediyor."
languages.original_text: "They are led by an Imperial Guard Commissar by the name of Iako Sotniy, a rather spirited man with a booming voice. He claims to have played a key part in your escape from Commorragh and that he is ready to serve faithfully in the name of the Imperium."
